channel.title: Series on Asako Mikami
channel.description: Recent content in Series on Asako Mikami

item.title: JMP by Women In Economics
item.description: This is a series of blog posts where I review job market papers written by women graduating from Economics PhD programs in 2020. The papers are selected from Jennifer Doleac’s Twitter thread. There are both theoretical and empirical papers, but since economics is not my field of expertise, I will almost always be reviewing an empirical paper where my knowledge of statistics and causal inference can help me comprehend the research design and interpret the results.
